long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily preserve and access web pages with the URL Archiver extension. With a single shortcut, instantly archive the current page to the Wayback Machine (archive.ph) and view the archived version in a new tab. Ideal for researchers, journalists, and anyone who needs to save important web content for future reference, this extension simplifies the process of maintaining a reliable record of online information. Ensure you never lose valuable content and quickly access historical snapshots with just a click.
